org.xmlcml.cml.element
Class SpecialAttribute

java.lang.Object
  org.xmlcml.cml.element.SpecialAttribute

public class SpecialAttribute
extends java.lang.Object

user-modifiable class supporting special attributes. these are attributes which have specific code assocaietd with them. and which created there own subclassed attribute objects normally of type string but others are possible
